name: Sandra Pelley
what_you_do: Sandra Pelley hosts the World Of Oneness Summit, focusing on various metaphysical and spiritual practices, including energy healing, astrology, oracle reading, intuitive guidance, and meditation techniques.
who_you_serve: The summit serves individuals interested in spiritual growth and metaphysical practices, providing a supportive community for like-minded individuals and experienced practitioners.
current_projects: World Of Oneness Summit in September 2025
business_focus: Sandra Pelley hosts the World Of Oneness Summit, focusing on various metaphysical and spiritual practices, including energy healing, astrology, oracle reading, intuitive guidance, and meditation techniques. (spirituality)
